item.title: Crafting problem
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

well i add my code to my server and then when i use like an rune ore on the smelting furnace it says all the crafting messages i maded in the method i guess there’s something wrong can someone help me?

here is my code:

if(ItemID == 1741 && UsedOnObjectID == 2644 && playerLevel[12] >= 1) { deleteItem(1741, 1); addItem(1059, 1); addSkillXP(100, 1); setAnimation(894); sM("You succesfully maded leather gloves."); } if(ItemID == 1741 && UsedOnObjectID == 2644 && playerLevel[12] >= 10) { deleteItem(1741, 1); addItem(1061, 1); addSkillXP(250, 1); setAnimation(894); sM("You succesfully maded leather boots."); } else { sM("you need a crafting level of 10 to do this."); } if(ItemID == 1741 && UsedOnObjectID == 2644 && playerLevel[12] >= 21) { deleteItem(1741, 1); addItem(1063, 1); addSkillXP(500, 1); setAnimation(894); sM("You succesfully maded leather vambraces."); } else { sM("you need a crafting level of 21 to do this."); } if(ItemID == 1741 && UsedOnObjectID == 2644 && playerLevel[12] >= 32) { deleteItem(1741, 1); addItem(1095, 1); addSkillXP(750, 1); setAnimation(894); sM("You succesfully maded leather chaps."); } else { sM("you need a crafting level of 32 to do this."); } if(ItemID == 1741 && UsedOnObjectID == 2644 && playerLevel[12] >= 40) { deleteItem(1741, 1); addItem(1129, 1); addSkillXP(1000, 1); setAnimation(894); sM("You succesfully maded a leather body."); } else { sM("you need a crafting level of 40 to do this."); } if(ItemID == 1743 && UsedOnObjectID == 2644 && playerLevel[12] >=48) { deleteItem(1743, 1);
